name: Father's Sacrifice
description:
Story:

You are a father of a young girl named Eva. She is dying and needs a cure. But you must travel a hard and dangerous path to get it. Are you up for the challenge?

Gameplay:

AD or left and right arrow keys - Move left to right

Space - Jump

You play as the father of the young girl and try to get to the end of each level collecting a coin. Can you be a 'True father'?  Well find out!

Features:

- Skins-Achievements

-Coins

-30 levels

-Secrets

-3 boss battle's

Author:

AntonioDK

Currently the game is only up on itch and for PC only. I hope i will make it also for Android. Hope you like it make sure to give any feedback if you find a glitch or have a great idea. See you in the next one...
